text_block_list.text:
If I were to make a comparison, it would be like the 
excitement of opening a new book. The thrill of becoming 
immersed in a story after reading just the first line.

That was the feeling I had the moment this Selection 
race started. The entire audience was filled with a 
strange excitement because of this heated race――

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft and Daring Heart! 
Both of them took a good position!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
And from behind, Air Messiah is aiming for them too! 
Ah, and now she's making her move!

As had been previously reported, there appeared to be many 
talented Uma Musume running today. The tension in the air 
was almost like that of a Major race. I clench my fists.
Just who will win this battle――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Kuu……!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It's Rhein Kraft! With 200m to go, Rhein Kraft is pulling 
ahead!! What tenacity! Her pace isn't dropping!
choice_data_list: Is that girl going to hold on……!?
Is that girl going to hold on……!?

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Look! From behind! 
She's chasing with incredible speed!

text_block_list.name: The Uma Musume Chasing
text_block_list.text:
……………………! 
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!

With a flurry of blue and gold, the race surged forward. One Uma 
Musume cut through the distance, rushing forward next to Rhein Kraft.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Is that Cesario? At the final corner, I was sure she was 
really far behind. To think she could catch up like that……!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Kuu…………not yet!! 
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaーーーー!!!
I could feel my heart pounding in my chest.

"That instant was I turn'd into a hart; And my 
desires, like fell and cruel hounds, E'er since 
pursue me." ――The line from a famous play came to mind.

These were the words of a Duke expressing his feelings of falling 
in love with a Countess. But that's how I felt about that last leg.

Cesario――a beautiful and noble name. 
She almost had the air of a queen.

While I was soaking in the atmosphere, the crowd 
had already surrounded the competitors. I was 
completely behind and hurried my way to the crowd.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. The 『Oka Sho』, 『Oaks』, and 『Shuuka Sho』――To conquer 
these 3, and achieve the Triple Tiara is my goal.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
The Tiara rotation, huh……! Yeah, let's aim for it together! 
If it's you, without a doubt, it can be done!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Cesario-san, let me scout you! If it's the Tiara rotation, 
I have experience. I won't make you regret it!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
For the many enthusiastic invitations, I am sincerely 
grateful. Outside of signing a contract, I would also 
like to get to know all of you more.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
First, through dialogue……to further deepen our 
understanding of each other. Once our career 
begins, we'll be walking together as a team.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That's true. After this, let's take some time and have a long 
chat. I'll prepare some instructional materials for that time.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
I'll also draw up a plan tailored to your goal. If you don't 
mind, could you tell me why you are aiming for the Triple Tiara?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Beyond the big dream of the Triple Tiara, 
I……have another dream in mind.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And that's to become a guiding light for future Uma Musume―― 
Therefore, to prove my worth, I must win races.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
In particular, the 『Oaks』, I cannot let that escape me. 
The Queen's Crown of the Oaks, is something I must take hold of……

What does it mean to prove your worth as a guiding light? 
――Even during meals, I couldn't stop thinking about her.
choice_data_list: I couldn't even talk to her……Ah!

text_block_list.text:
My hand slips and knocks over my half-empty glass. The contents 
of the glass spilled all over the table, dripping off of the edges.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaah, what a mess! 
I'll go get something to wipe the table!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I'll leave that to you. ……Looks like it's soaked up to the hem. 
I'll remove the stain. Will you lend me your jacket?

After I handed her my jacket, she placed a handkerchief under 
the the stained area then used a wet rag to dab at the stain.

That girl I didn't get a chance to speak to was right 
in front of me……while I was still trying to think of 
what to say, the table and jacket were both cleaned……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
You didn't need to treat us though. Trainer-san, you're 
quite the upstanding individual. Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, cake, cake♪ This is the same as the one we split before, 
isn't it Cesario? And today's has a lot of fruit too!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That time, it was the last one left, right? Talking about which of 
us was going to take which fruits while eating was fun, wasn't it♪?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Kraft, do you need sugar? If you want some, I'll add it. If it's 
too hot, let me know. I'll cool it down by blowing on it.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Thank you! Cesario, you're so sweet～!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Um, your glass is empty, would you like some more water? Would 
you prefer room temperature or hot water? I'll go get some.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ? What's wrong?

This definitely looks like Cesario from the Selection race. 
But, there wasn't a trace of that noble aura from before.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I know! Cesario's atmosphere is completely 
different so you're surprised, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Cesario has, how should I put it, a very distinct difference between 
On and Off. It switches based on the situation――isn't that right?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, sometimes I get asked 『Which one is the 
real Cesario?』, but they're both me. It's just 
a difference between whether I'm focused or not……

Even if she explained it that way, it was like she was 
a completely different person. I wonder if that just 
means she's controlling herself much more strictly.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Fuaaaah……now that I'm full, I'm getting sleepy, maybe……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It's nice and sunny here isn't it? These seats are in 
the shade of a column so you can use my lap as a pillow.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yaaay……then, a short nap……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
How about taking a short break too? 
I have a blanket with me so I'll lend it to you.
choice_data_list: Then……no, wait! I think I'm fine!

text_block_list.text:
I was almost swept away by her soft smile, but as an 
adult, I can't just sleep here! I shake my head in panic.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I see…… Then, can you hold out your hand?

Cesario grabbed my outstretched hand in hers and 
firmly pressed in to it. I was surprised at first, 
but the pleasant pressure helped clear my head.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
These pressure points help relieve fatigue. 
Whenever you're feeling a little tired, I recommend doing this.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, looks like the color has returned to your face a little. 
Don't push yourself too hard in the afternoon, okay?
choice_data_list: Thank you. I'm feeling better now

text_block_list.text:
The face was the same. The voice was the same. 
But they were two different expressions.

Just like morning and night come together to make a 
full day, they were two faces of the same coin. How 
could I not be interested in that state of being……?
